trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME is your commander, choose a color before the game begins. CARDNAME is the chosen color.\nPartner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

trans-unit.resname: CMM·1 | The Prismatic Piper | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It is everything and nothing.
trans-unit.target: 万物皆是，万物皆非。

trans-unit.source: When you cast this spell, if you have fewer than seven cards in hand, draw cards equal to the difference.\nMenace\nDiscard a card with mana value X: Counter target spell with mana value X.

trans-unit.resname: CMM·2 | Kozilek, the Great Distortion | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A void as cryptic as reality itself.
trans-unit.target: 如现实般神秘的虚无。

trans-unit.source:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Spells of the chosen type you cast cost {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} less to cast. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay.
Other creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.
trans-unit.target: 化形（此牌是所有生物类别。） 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一种生物类别。 你施放的该类别咒语减少{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}来施放。此效应仅减少你支付的有色法术力数量。 由你操控的其他该类别生物得+1/+1。

trans-unit.source: No thought but hunger. No strategy but destruction.

trans-unit.source: Sunspear Shikari
trans-unit.target: 日矛猎户

trans-unit.resname: CMM·62 | Sunspear Shikari | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As long as CARDNAME is equipped, it has first strike and lifelink.
trans-unit.target: 只要CARDNAME佩带武具，它便具有先攻与系命异能。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·62 | Sunspear Shikari | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Raksha's sudden departure split the leonin into two prides. The fight for survival reunited them.
trans-unit.target: 拉夏突然消失，令狮族分裂成两群。御敌求生之战，令他们重归于一体。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·63 | Supply Runners | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Supply Runners
trans-unit.target: 补给奔跃犬

trans-unit.resname: CMM·63 | Supply Runners | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，在每个由你操控的其他生物上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·63 | Supply Runners | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Good dogs stay by your side until the end. Great dogs leave to bring back aid.
trans-unit.target: 忠犬会陪你坚持到最后。上犬则会离开去寻回救援。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·64 | Swift Response | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Swift Response
trans-unit.target: 快速反应

trans-unit.resname: CMM·64 | Swift Response | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target tapped creature.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标已横置的生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·64 | Swift Response | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "There's nothing quite as satisfying as delivering a good kick to the face."\n—Adrasteia, Akroan captain
trans-unit.target: 「没有什么事情比往敌人脸上狠狠踹一脚更解气的了。」 ～阿喀洛斯队长阿卓斯蒂娅

trans-unit.resname: CMM·65 | Teshar, Ancestor's Apostle | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Teshar, Ancestor's Apostle
trans-unit.target: 圣祖灵门徒铁夏

trans-unit.resname: CMM·65 | Teshar, Ancestor's Apostle | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever you cast a historic spell, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当你施放史迹咒语时，将目标法术力值等于或小于3的生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。（神器、传奇和传纪是史迹。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·65 | Teshar, Ancestor's Apostle | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Ancestor saved us for a purpose."
trans-unit.target: 「圣祖灵救吾人性命必有其用意。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·66 | Thraben Inspector | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Thraben Inspector
trans-unit.target: 瑟班巡检官

trans-unit.resname: CMM·66 | Thraben Inspector | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，探查。（派出一个线索衍生物。它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·66 | Thraben Inspector | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "If you've been at this as long as I have, nothing can surprise you. That's the hope, at least."
trans-unit.target: 「如果你也和我一样在这行干了这么多年，那应该没东西能吓到你了。至少这也算是希望吧。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·67 | Unbounded Potential | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Unbounded Potential
trans-unit.target: 无拘潜能

trans-unit.resname: CMM·67 | Unbounded Potential | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.
• Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
Entwine {3}{W} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～ •在至多两个目标生物上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。 •增殖。（选择任意数量的永久物和／或牌手，然后为其已有之每种指示物各多放置一个同类的指示物。） 打包{3}{W}（如果你支付打包费用，则两项都选。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·68 | Wakening Sun's Avatar | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wakening Sun's Avatar
trans-unit.target: 晓阳化身

trans-unit.resname: CMM·68 | Wakening Sun's Avatar | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, destroy all non-Dinosaur creatures.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，若你从你手上施放之，则消灭所有非恐龙生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·68 | Wakening Sun's Avatar | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Kinjalli's encompassing rays herald new life in the moment of the sun's dawning."\n—Chitlati, Lightning Rider
trans-unit.target: 「太阳破晓时，津加理光芒笼罩万物，召引新生。」 ～迅雷龙骑奇拉蒂

trans-unit.resname: CMM·69 | Wanderer's Strike | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wanderer's Strike
trans-unit.target: 飘萍斩

trans-unit.resname: CMM·69 | Wanderer's Strike | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile target creature, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标生物，然后增殖。（选择任意数量的永久物和／或牌手，然后为其已有之每种指示物各多放置一个同类的指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·69 | Wanderer's Strike | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Precise, clean cuts. No one saw anything. Again. Tag the report with my code and file it."\n—Lavinia
trans-unit.target: 「切口精准、整齐。没人看清发生了什么。和上次一样。将报告附上我的代码，整理归档。」 ～拉温妮

trans-unit.resname: CMM·70 | Wrath of God | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wrath of God
trans-unit.target: 神之愤怒

trans-unit.resname: CMM·70 | Wrath of God | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有生物。它们不能重生。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·70 | Wrath of God | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Legend speaks of the lost coastal polis of Olantin, whose inhabitants' hubris enraged the sun god Heliod.
trans-unit.target: 传说中，海滨城邦欧兰廷人才济济但傲气盖天，因此触怒了太阳神赫利欧德，致使此地历史就此亡佚。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·71 | Zetalpa, Primal Dawn | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Zetalpa, Primal Dawn
trans-unit.target: 始辉泽塔帕

trans-unit.resname: CMM·71 | Zetalpa, Primal Dawn | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, double strike, vigilance, trample, indestructible
trans-unit.target: 飞行，连击，警戒，践踏，不灭

trans-unit.resname: CMM·71 | Zetalpa, Primal Dawn | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The sky takes flight and the earth trembles.
trans-unit.target: 天空逃散，大地震颤。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·72 | Aether Gale | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Aether Gale
trans-unit.target: 乙太狂风

trans-unit.resname: CMM·72 | Aether Gale | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return six target nonland permanents to their owners' hands.
trans-unit.target: 将六个目标非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·72 | Aether Gale | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The militia formed up in the central plaza awaiting the onslaught, but the giants never quite made it.
trans-unit.target: 义勇兵已在中心广场严阵以待，准备抵御巨人强大攻势，但敌人却从未出现。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·73 | Aminatou's Augury | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Aminatou's Augury
trans-unit.target: 阿米娜图的卜算

trans-unit.resname: CMM·73 | Aminatou's Augury | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile the top eight cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield. Until end of turn, for each nonland card type, you may cast a spell of that type from among the exiled cards without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 放逐你牌库顶的八张牌。你可以将其中一张地牌放进战场。直到回合结束，对每种非地之牌张类别而言，你可以从所放逐的牌之中施放一个该类别的咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·74 | Azami, Lady of Scrolls | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Azami, Lady of Scrolls
trans-unit.target: 万卷蓟夫人

trans-unit.resname: CMM·74 | Azami, Lady of Scrolls | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Tap an untapped Wizard you control: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 横置一个由你操控且未横置的法术师：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·74 | Azami, Lady of Scrolls | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Choices belong to those with the luxuries of time and distance. We have neither. I recommend we proceed with the plan to destroy all shrines of the kami."\n—Lady Azami, letter to Sensei Hisoka
trans-unit.target: 「选择这东西，是享有充分时间与距离者的特权；可惜这两者吾等均付之匮如。我建议采用的计划，就是消灭所有神明的祭祠。」 ～蓟夫人致密师范

trans-unit.resname: CMM·75 | Body Double | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Body Double
trans-unit.target: 替身妖

trans-unit.resname: CMM·75 | Body Double | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may have CARDNAME enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature card in a graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使CARDNAME当成坟墓场中任一生物牌的复制品来进入战场。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·75 | Body Double | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I am who I pretend to be."
trans-unit.target: 「所化即所成。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·76 | Braids, Conjurer Adept | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Braids, Conjurer Adept
trans-unit.target: 咒法专家布蕾德

trans-unit.resname: CMM·76 | Braids, Conjurer Adept | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may put an artifact, creature, or land card from their hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的维持开始时，该牌手可以将一张神器，生物或地牌从其手上放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·76 | Braids, Conjurer Adept | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The rifted multiverse became a sea of conflicting realities, each peopled by possible versions of every living being.
trans-unit.target: 受时缝影响的多重宇宙里，现实彼此冲突，挤满了每个生灵各种可能成为的样貌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·77 | Bribery | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bribery
trans-unit.target: 贿赂

trans-unit.resname: CMM·77 | Bribery | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search target opponent's library for a creature card and put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles.
trans-unit.target: 从目标对手的牌库中搜寻一张生物牌，并将该牌在你的操控下放进战场。然后该牌手洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·77 | Bribery | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It seems your ticket is in order after all, ma'am."
trans-unit.target: 「女士，您的票看起来都没问题。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·78 | Brinelin, the Moon Kraken | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Brinelin, the Moon Kraken
trans-unit.target: 明月巨海兽碧鳞

trans-unit.resname: CMM·78 | Brinelin, the Moon Kraken | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield and whenever you cast a spell with mana value 6 or greater, you may return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.\nPartner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场和每当你施放法术力值等于或大于6的咒语时，你可以将目标非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。 拍档（你可将两个具有拍档异能的生物共同用作指挥官。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·79 | Capture of Jingzhou | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Capture of Jingzhou
trans-unit.target: 收复荆州

trans-unit.resname: CMM·79 | Capture of Jingzhou | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Take an extra turn after this one.
trans-unit.target: 于本回合后进行额外的一个回合。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·79 | Capture of Jingzhou | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The province of Jingzhou was the fulcrum of the three kingdoms. At separate times it was coveted and controlled by the Wu, the Shu, and the Wei.
trans-unit.target: 荆州在三国时期中是兵家必争之地，屡屡被魏国、蜀国及吴国垂涎。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·80 | Commandeer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Commandeer
trans-unit.target: 霸占

trans-unit.resname: CMM·80 | Commandeer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You may exile two blue cards from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.\nGain control of target noncreature spell. You may choose new targets for it. (If that spell is an artifact, enchantment, or planeswalker, the permanent enters the battlefield under your control.)
trans-unit.target: 你可以从你手上放逐两张蓝色牌，而不支付此咒语的法术力费用。 获得目标非生物咒语的操控权。你可以为它选择新的目标。（如果该咒语是神器，结界或鹏洛客，则所成之永久物是在你的操控下进战场。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·81 | Counterspell | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Counterspell
trans-unit.target: 反击咒语

trans-unit.resname: CMM·81 | Counterspell | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·81 | Counterspell | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The pyromancer summoned up her mightiest onslaught of fire and rage. Jace feigned interest.
trans-unit.target: 烈焰术士唤出愤怒火焰展开猛攻。杰斯假装很感兴趣。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·82 | Coveted Peacock | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Coveted Peacock
trans-unit.target: 簇捧孔雀

trans-unit.resname: CMM·82 | Coveted Peacock | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, you may goad target creature defending player controls. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以煽惑目标由防御牌手操控的生物。（直到你的下一个回合，该生物每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击，且若能攻击除你以外的牌手，则必须如此作。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·83 | Cryptic Serpent | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cryptic Serpent
trans-unit.target: 隐密巨蛇

trans-unit.resname: CMM·83 | Cryptic Serpent | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 你坟墓场中每有一张瞬间与法术牌，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·83 | Cryptic Serpent | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It slithers through the senses, constricting consciousness and poisoning perceptions.
trans-unit.target: 它能绕过感官，束缩感觉并毒害感知。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·84 | Cyclonic Rift | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cyclonic Rift
trans-unit.target: 龙卷裂空

trans-unit.resname: CMM·84 | Cyclonic Rift | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.\nOverload {6}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")
trans-unit.target: 将目标不由你操控的非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。 超载{6}{U}（你可以支付此咒语的超载费用来施放它。若你如此作，则将其叙述中的「目标」更改为「每个」。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·84 | Cyclonic Rift | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Izzet specialize in unnatural disaster.
trans-unit.target: 伊捷以非天然灾害为业。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·85 | Day's Undoing | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Day's Undoing
trans-unit.target: 重启一日

trans-unit.resname: CMM·85 | Day's Undoing | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards. If it's your turn, end the turn. (Exile all spells and abilities from the stack, including this card. Discard down to your maximum hand size. Damage wears off, and "this turn" and "until end of turn" effects end.)
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手将其手牌与坟墓场洗入其牌库，然后各抓七张牌。如果是在你的回合中，则结束本回合。（放逐堆叠上的所有咒语和异能，包括此牌。你将手牌弃掉，直到满足手牌上限为止。生物上的伤害消失，并且注记着「本回合」与「直到回合结束」的效应均结束。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·86 | Deep Analysis | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Deep Analysis
trans-unit.target: 深入分析

trans-unit.resname: CMM·86 | Deep Analysis | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target player draws two cards.\nFlashback—{1}{U}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手抓两张牌。 返照～{1}{U}，支付3点生命。（你可以从你坟墓场中施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·86 | Deep Analysis | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The specimen seems to be broken."
trans-unit.target: 「这样本似乎有点坏。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·87 | Deranged Assistant | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Deranged Assistant
trans-unit.target: 狂乱助手

trans-unit.resname: CMM·87 | Deranged Assistant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Mill a card: Add {C}. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: {T}，磨一张牌：加{C}。（磨一张牌的流程是将你牌库顶的牌置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·87 | Deranged Assistant | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Garl, adjust the slurry dispensers. Garl, fetch more corpses. Garl, quit crying and give me your brain tissue. If he doesn't stop being so rude, I'm quitting."
trans-unit.target: 「嘎耳，把泥浆机调一下。嘎耳，再搬几具尸体来。嘎耳，别哭了，把你的脑组织给我。如果他一直这么粗鲁，我就不干了。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·88 | Efficient Construction | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Efficient Construction
trans-unit.target: 高效建造

trans-unit.resname: CMM·88 | Efficient Construction | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放神器咒语时，派出一个1/1无色，具飞行异能的振翼机衍生神器生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·88 | Efficient Construction | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: For some of Ghirapur's aerowrights, building thopters is a byproduct of larger construction efforts.
trans-unit.target: 对吉拉波部分煅空匠而言，振翼机不过是建设大型工程时顺手造出来的东西而已。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·89 | Evacuation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Evacuation
trans-unit.target: 逃难

trans-unit.resname: CMM·89 | Evacuation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return all creatures to their owners' hands.
trans-unit.target: 将所有生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·89 | Evacuation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Once I supply the breeze, you'll see your warriors for the smoke they truly are."\n—Alexi, zephyr mage
trans-unit.target: 「一旦我让风吹起，你会看到手下兵士如烟散去。」 ～西风法师阿蕾克丝

trans-unit.resname: CMM·90 | Exclude | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Exclude
trans-unit.target: 排拒

trans-unit.resname: CMM·90 | Exclude | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Counter target creature spell.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标生物咒语。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·90 | Exclude | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I don't have time for you right now."\n—Teferi
trans-unit.target: 「现在没空和你闲耗。」 ～泰菲力

trans-unit.resname: CMM·91 | Fact or Fiction | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fact or Fiction
trans-unit.target: 真伪莫辨

trans-unit.resname: CMM·91 | Fact or Fiction | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 展示你牌库顶的五张牌。由任一对手将它们分成两堆。将其中一堆置于你手上，另一堆则置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·91 | Fact or Fiction | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Slimefoot, I know I said I wanted to grow our repository of knowledge, but this isn't what I had in mind."
trans-unit.target: 「黏足，我是说过要丰富我们的知识储备，但我想的不是这种方式。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·92 | Faerie Artisans | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Faerie Artisans
trans-unit.target: 仙灵工匠

trans-unit.resname: CMM·92 | Faerie Artisans | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, create a token that's a copy of that creature except it's an artifact in addition to its other types. Then exile all other tokens created with CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当一个非衍生物的生物在对手操控下进战场时，派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为该生物的复制品，但额外具有神器此类别。然后放逐所有以CARDNAME派出的其他衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·93 | Fall from Favor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fall from Favor
trans-unit.target: 失宠

trans-unit.resname: CMM·93 | Fall from Favor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature and you become the monarch.\nEnchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step unless that player is the monarch.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 当CARDNAME进战场时，横置所结附的生物，且你成为君主。 除非所结附之生物的操控者是君主，否则它于该牌手的重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·94 | Fierce Guardianship | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fierce Guardianship
trans-unit.target: 厉行守护

trans-unit.resname: CMM·94 | Fierce Guardianship | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: If you control a commander, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost.\nCounter target noncreature spell.
trans-unit.target: 如果你操控指挥官，则你可以施放此咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。 反击目标非生物咒语。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·94 | Fierce Guardianship | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Hunt somewhere else. This is your only warning."\n—Gavi, nest warden
trans-unit.target: 「去别处打猎。我只警告这一次。」 ～巢穴护卫盖薇

trans-unit.resname: CMM·95 | Filigree Attendant | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Filigree Attendant
trans-unit.target: 丝金随员

trans-unit.resname: CMM·95 | Filigree Attendant | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nCARDNAME's power is equal to the number of artifacts you control.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 CARDNAME的力量等同于由你操控之神器数量。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·95 | Filigree Attendant | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The perfect assistant is one that's responsive, dextrous, and capable of reaching all the high shelves."\n—Coruk, Esper artificer
trans-unit.target: 「最完美的助理要反应快，手工巧，还能摸到架子最高处。」 ～艾斯波神器师寇路

trans-unit.resname: CMM·96 | Frantic Search | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Frantic Search
trans-unit.target: 狂搜乱寻

trans-unit.resname: CMM·96 | Frantic Search | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw two cards, then discard two cards. Untap up to three lands.
trans-unit.target: 抓两张牌，然后弃两张牌。重置至多三个地。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·96 | Frantic Search | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It took the banning of temporal manipulation at Tolaria West to teach its students the value of time.
trans-unit.target: 待陶拉里亚西境学院禁止时间操纵课程之后，学生才真正晓得时间的价值。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·97 | Ghost of Ramirez DePietro | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ghost of Ramirez DePietro
trans-unit.target: 拉米雷迪皮托的鬼魂

trans-unit.resname: CMM·97 | Ghost of Ramirez DePietro | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked by creatures with toughness 3 or greater.\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, choose up to one target card in a graveyard that was discarded or put there from a library this turn. Put that card into its owner's hand.\nPartner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能被防御力等于或大于3的生物阻挡。 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，选择至多一张目标在坟墓场中的牌，且须为本回合中弃掉或从牌库进入该处者。将该牌置于其拥有者手上。 拍档（你可将两个具有拍档异能的生物共同用作指挥官。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·98 | Ghostly Flicker | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 鬼影闪烁

trans-unit.target: 放逐两个目标由你操控的神器，生物和／或地，然后将这些牌在你的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·98 | Ghostly Flicker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Sometimes it's useful to take a break from existence.
trans-unit.target: 有时暂且消失也不错。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·99 | Goliath Sphinx | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Goliath Sphinx
trans-unit.target: 巨硕史芬斯

trans-unit.resname: CMM·99 | Goliath Sphinx | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: CMM·99 | Goliath Sphinx | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: He makes his home on the tallest mountain in Sejiri, where the vista is as endless as his patience.
trans-unit.target: 他在塞基黎最高的山上歇息翅翼；此处的远景无限宽广，一如其耐心。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·100 | Inga Rune-Eyes | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Inga Rune-Eyes
trans-unit.target: 符眼茵嘉

trans-unit.resname: CMM·100 | Inga Rune-Eyes | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, scry 3.\nWhen CARDNAME dies, draw three cards if three or more creatures died this turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，占卜3。 当CARDNAME死去时，如果本回合中有三个或更多生物死去，则抓三张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·100 | Inga Rune-Eyes | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Each path ever charted by an Omenseeker is etched into her eyes.
trans-unit.target: 预兆觅径人编绘的每条径路，都深深蚀刻在她眼中。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·101 | Kaho, Minamo Historian | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, search your library for up to three instant cards, exile them, then shuffle.\n{X}, {T}: You may cast a spell with mana value X from among cards exiled with Kaho without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，从你牌库中搜寻至多三张瞬间牌，将它们放逐，然后洗牌。 {X}，{T}：你可以从以歌穗放逐的牌之中施放一个法术力值为X的咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·102 | Looter il-Kor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)\nWhenever CARDNAME deals damage to an opponent, draw a card, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 次元幽影（此生物只能阻挡具次元幽影异能的生物，亦只能被具此异能的生物阻挡。） 每当CARDNAME向任一对手造成伤害时，抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·102 | Looter il-Kor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Unable to touch items of value, he goes forth to steal secrets instead.
trans-unit.target: 既然贵重品无从得手，他转而窃取秘密。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·103 | Lorthos, the Tidemaker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lorthos, the Tidemaker
trans-unit.target: 兴潮罗佐司

trans-unit.resname: CMM·103 | Lorthos, the Tidemaker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, you may pay {8}. If you do, tap up to eight target permanents. Those permanents don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以支付{8}。若你如此作，则横置至多八个目标永久物。这些永久物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·103 | Lorthos, the Tidemaker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When Lorthos emerges from his deepwater realm, the tides bow to his will and the coastline cowers in his presence.
trans-unit.target: 罗佐司从其深海国度现身，潮浪为其意志而躬身行礼，海岸见其身形即畏缩奔逃。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·104 | Loyal Drake | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Loyal Drake
trans-unit.target: 忠诚龙兽

trans-unit.target: 飞行 副官～在你回合的战斗开始时，若你操控你的指挥官，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·104 | Loyal Drake | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Doves and pigeons are too subtle. When I send a message, I want it to have some teeth."\n—Aeschel, royal diplomat
trans-unit.target: 「鸿雁飞鸽什么的都太不显眼了。传书的时候，我还是喜欢派有牙齿的去。」 ～皇家外交官伊舍尔

trans-unit.target: 携手～由你开始，每位牌手各可以支付任意数量的法术力。每位牌手各抓X张牌，X为以此法支付的法术力总数量。

trans-unit.target: 乌鸦群

trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当另一个生物死去时，你可以抓一张牌。若你如此作，则弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·106 | Murder of Crows | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Even more than carrion, they crave the last words of the dying.
trans-unit.target: 比起腐肉，它们更渴求死者的临终话语。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·107 | Murmuring Mystic | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Rumors float through the city like crows, alighting on citizens seemingly at random.
trans-unit.target: 谣言如鸦群飞舞城中，看似不经意间就停在市民肩头。

trans-unit.source:
Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.
• Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
• Return target creature to its owner's hand.
• Draw a card.

trans-unit.source: Padeem, Consul of Innovation
trans-unit.target: 求新执政珀蒂

trans-unit.resname: CMM·109 | Padeem, Consul of Innovation | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Artifacts you control have hexproof.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, if you control the artifact with the highest mana value or tied for the highest mana value, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的神器具有辟邪异能。 在你的维持开始时，若你操控法术力值最大或与他者同为最大的神器，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·109 | Padeem, Consul of Innovation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Impress me."
trans-unit.target: 「让我大开眼界吧。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·110 | Personal Tutor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Personal Tutor
trans-unit.target: 个人导师

trans-unit.target: 从你牌库中搜寻一张法术牌，展示该牌，然后洗牌，并将该牌置于牌库顶。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·110 | Personal Tutor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Lomelda had spent four semesters on the waitlist for Kasmina's Advanced Polymorphological Theory seminar. She was determined not to miss a word.
trans-unit.target: 洛梅达在等候名单上足足排了四个学期，才如愿修读克蜜娜的高阶变型原理课程。她决心绝不听漏一字。

trans-unit.target: 压印～当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以放逐目标非衍生物的生物。 CARDNAME得+X/+Y，X为所放逐之生物牌的力量，Y为该牌的防御力。

trans-unit.target: 闪现 当CARDNAME于宣告攻击者步骤中进战场时，你可以为目标进行攻击的生物重新选择其攻击的牌手或永久物。（它不能攻击其操控者或其操控者的永久物。）

trans-unit.target: 放逐目标生物。其操控者显化其牌库顶牌。（该牌手将其牌库顶牌面朝下地放进战场，当成2/2生物。若该牌是生物牌，则可随时支付其法术力费用来翻回正面。）

trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}{C}。此法术力只能用来施放神器咒语，或是起动神器的异能。 {U}，{T}：从你牌库中搜寻一张名称为穿心弓或龙炎瓶的牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.target: 放逐目标神器或生物。其操控者派出一个4/4，蓝红双色的元素衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·115 | Resculpt | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Critics were struck first by the elemental's surprising grace, and then by its fists.
trans-unit.target: 评委先是为这元素的绝伦优雅倾倒，而后被它的数记重拳击倒。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·116 | Reverse Engineer | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 究研原理

trans-unit.resname: CMM·116 | Reverse Engineer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)\nDraw three cards.
trans-unit.target: 拼造（此咒语能用你的神器来协助施放。你起动完法术力异能之后每横置一个神器，就能为此咒语支付{1}。） 抓三张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·116 | Reverse Engineer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Hold, an illegal research facility in a derelict merchant ship, became a wellspring of renegade intelligence.
trans-unit.target: 「要塞」这处设在废弃商船上的非法研究设施，现已成为乱匠的情报泉源。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·117 | Rise from the Tides | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rise from the Tides
trans-unit.target: 浪潮复生

trans-unit.source: Create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 你坟墓场中每有一张瞬间与法术牌，便派出一个已横置的2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·117 | Rise from the Tides | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Dear brother, it's sweet that you have chosen to share your toys with Ludevic, but I too have found some new playmates."\n—Ghoulcaller Gisa
trans-unit.target: 「亲爱的弟弟，你把自己的玩具和卢德维一起分享真是好心，不过我也找到了一些新玩伴。」 ～尸鬼牧者基沙

trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.\n{1}{U}, Sacrifice two artifacts: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放神器咒语时，派出一个1/1无色，具飞行异能的振翼机衍生神器生物。 {1}{U}，牺牲两个神器：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·118 | Sai, Master Thopterist | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Industry without artistry is just a fancy way to fill the junkyard."
trans-unit.target: 「量产品若不加修饰，产出物与垃圾无异。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·119 | Shipwreck Dowser | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 灵技（每当你施放非生物咒语时，此生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。） 当CARDNAME进战场时，将目标瞬间或法术牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·119 | Shipwreck Dowser | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Lost at sea doesn't have to mean lost forever.
trans-unit.target: 失落于海中不一定意味着无法再度寻得。

trans-unit.target: 觅咒师

trans-unit.resname: CMM·120 | Spellseeker | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.resname: CMM·120 | Spellseeker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Mages and warriors recruited from across Kylem display their skills at Valor's Reach.
trans-unit.target: 来自全凯勒姆的法师与战士在英勇巅各展身手。

trans-unit.source: Hexproof\nLieutenant — As long as you control your commander, CARDNAME gets +2/+2 and has "Whenever CARDNAME becomes blocked, you may draw two cards."
trans-unit.target: 辟邪 副官～只要你操控你的指挥官，CARDNAME便得+2/+2且具有「每当CARDNAME被阻挡时，你可以抓两张牌。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·122 | Stormsurge Kraken | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Most see krakens as wantonly violent, failing to notice their meticulous attention to detail when dismantling a vessel.
trans-unit.target: 许多人都认为巨海怪只会恣意施暴，却从未注意到它们破坏船舶时的细腻讲究。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·123 | Sun Quan, Lord of Wu | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sun Quan, Lord of Wu
trans-unit.target: 吴国君主孙权

trans-unit.resname: CMM·123 | Sun Quan, Lord of Wu | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control have horsemanship. (They can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物具有马术异能。（它们只能被具马术异能的生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·123 | Sun Quan, Lord of Wu | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "One score and four he reigned, the Southland king: / A dragon coiled, a tiger poised below the mighty Yangtze."
trans-unit.target: 「二十四年兴大业，龙蟠虎踞在江东。」 （第一零八回 丁奉雪中奋短兵）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·124 | Talrand, Sky Summoner | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Talrand, Sky Summoner
trans-unit.target: 空召师陶岚

trans-unit.resname: CMM·124 | Talrand, Sky Summoner | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放瞬间或法术咒语时，派出一个2/2蓝色，具飞行异能的龙兽衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·124 | Talrand, Sky Summoner | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The seas are vast, but the skies are even more so. Why be content with one kingdom when I can rule them both?"
trans-unit.target: 「大海浩瀚，但天空更加无际。如果我能同时统治两者，又何必只安于其一？」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·125 | Teferi, Temporal Archmage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Teferi, Temporal Archmage
trans-unit.target: 时间大法师泰菲力

trans-unit.resname: CMM·125 | Teferi, Temporal Archmage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
+1: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.
−1: Untap up to four target permanents.
−10: You get an emblem with "You may activate loyalty abilities of planeswalkers you control on any player's turn any time you could cast an instant."
CARDNAME can be your commander.
trans-unit.target: +1：检视你牌库顶的两张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，另一张则置于你的牌库底。 −1：重置至多四个目标永久物。 −10：你获得具有以下异能的徽记～「你可以在任意牌手的回合中，于你能够施放瞬间的时机下，起动由你操控之鹏洛客的忠诚异能。」 CARDNAME可用作指挥官。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·126 | Tetsuko Umezawa, Fugitive | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tetsuko Umezawa, Fugitive
trans-unit.target: 浪人梅泽哲子

trans-unit.resname: CMM·126 | Tetsuko Umezawa, Fugitive | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control with power or toughness 1 or less can't be blocked.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控且力量或防御力等于或小于1的生物不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·126 | Tetsuko Umezawa, Fugitive | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "My ancestor Toshiro used to say, 'Life is a series of choices between bad and worse.' I'm a master of making great bad choices."
trans-unit.target: 「俊郎先祖曾说，『生命是一连串的选择，每次都只有糟与更糟可选。』我最擅长选『糟』。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·127 | Thryx, the Sudden Storm | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Thryx, the Sudden Storm
trans-unit.target: 疾风暴特律克斯

trans-unit.resname: CMM·127 | Thryx, the Sudden Storm | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nFlying\nSpells you cast with mana value 5 or greater cost {1} less to cast and can't be countered.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 飞行 你施放之法术力值等于或大于5的咒语减少{1}来施放，且不能被反击。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·127 | Thryx, the Sudden Storm | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Even in their mountain fortresses, the Akroans have learned not to anger Thassa.
trans-unit.target: 即便躲在山脉要塞当中，阿喀洛斯人也学会了不要激怒塔萨。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·128 | Torrential Gearhulk | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Torrential Gearhulk
trans-unit.target: 汹涌巨械

trans-unit.resname: CMM·128 | Torrential Gearhulk | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may cast target instant card from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从你坟墓场中施放目标瞬间牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。如果该咒语将进入你的坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·129 | Tromokratis | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tromokratis
trans-unit.target: 卓莫克雷提

trans-unit.resname: CMM·129 | Tromokratis | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME has hexproof unless it's attacking or blocking.\nCARDNAME can't be blocked unless all creatures defending player controls block it. (If any creature that player controls doesn't block this creature, it can't be blocked.)
trans-unit.target: 除非CARDNAME正进行攻击或阻挡，否则它便具有辟邪异能。 除非由防御牌手操控的所有生物均阻挡之，否则CARDNAME便不能被阻挡。（如果任一由该牌手操控的生物未阻挡此生物，则它便不能被阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·130 | Urza, Lord High Artificer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Urza, Lord High Artificer
trans-unit.target: 铸物勋爵克撒

trans-unit.resname: CMM·130 | Urza, Lord High Artificer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 colorless Construct artifact creature token with "This creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control."\nTap an untapped artifact you control: Add {U}.\n{5}: Shuffle your library, then exile the top card. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个0/0无色组构体衍生神器生物，且具有「你每操控一个神器，此生物便得+1/+1。」 横置一个由你操控且未横置的神器：加{U}。 {5}：将你的牌库洗牌，然后放逐顶牌。直到回合结束，你可以使用该牌且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·131 | Vizier of Tumbling Sands | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Vizier of Tumbling Sands
trans-unit.target: 弄沙维齐尔

trans-unit.resname: CMM·131 | Vizier of Tumbling Sands | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Untap another target permanent.\nCycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)\nWhen you cycle CARDNAME, untap target permanent.
trans-unit.target: {T}：重置另一个目标永久物。 循环{1}{U}（{1}{U}，弃掉此牌：抓一张牌。） 当你循环CARDNAME时，重置目标永久物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·131 | Vizier of Tumbling Sands | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Time is like the Luxa River—though it flows in one direction, it can be diverted."
trans-unit.target: 「时间就像罗夏河～尽管只流向一方，但仍能牵动。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·132 | Whirler Rogue | Card Text | Paragraphs

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出两个1/1无色，具飞行异能的振翼机衍生神器生物。 横置两个由你操控且未横置的神器：目标生物本回合不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.target: 飞行 循环{U}（{U}，弃掉此牌：抓一张牌。） 当你循环CARDNAME时，目标生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·133 | Windcaller Aven | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Every cry lifts her allies toward the thunder.
trans-unit.target: 每一声呼喊都助力战友雷霆飞升。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·134 | Windrider Wizard | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Windrider Wizard
trans-unit.target: 御风法师

trans-unit.resname: CMM·134 | Windrider Wizard | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever you cast an instant, sorcery, or Wizard spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当你施放瞬间，法术或法术师咒语时，你可以抓一张牌。若你如此作，则弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·134 | Windrider Wizard | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It's an ideal method for exploring sky ruins. The drakes sniff me briefly but then lose interest."
trans-unit.target: 「这是探索天空遗迹的理想办法。虽然龙兽嗅到了我的味道，但很快就失去了兴趣。」

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，占卜2。 {3}{U}，牺牲CARDNAME：抓两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·135 | Witching Well | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It was built by the Witch of Lochmere. Most of the wishes it grants are its own.
trans-unit.target: 这口井是由密尔湖巫婆所造。它成全的，绝大多数都是自己的愿望。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·136 | Zahid, Djinn of the Lamp | Card Name

trans-unit.source: You may pay {3}{U} and tap an untapped artifact you control rather than pay this spell's mana cost.\nFlying
trans-unit.target: 你可以支付{3}{U}并横置一个由你操控且未横置的神器，而不支付此咒语的法术力费用。 飞行

trans-unit.resname: CMM·136 | Zahid, Djinn of the Lamp | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I do as I please, little mortal. Do go on about your wishes, though—they amuse me to no end."
trans-unit.target: 「我行事全随己愿，渺小的凡人。不过你的愿望但说无妨～这能让我开心一下。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·137 | Archfiend of Despair | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 绝望翼邪鬼

trans-unit.resname: CMM·137 | Archfiend of Despair | Card Text | Paragraphs

trans-unit.target: 飞行 所有对手都不能获得生命。 在每个结束步骤开始时，每位对手各失去等同于该牌手本回合中曾失去之数量的生命。（伤害会导致失去生命。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·138 | Bastion of Remembrance | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Lives taken are lives not easily forgotten.
trans-unit.target: 殒落的生命绝不会被轻易遗忘。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·139 | Bloodchief Ascension | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each end step, if an opponent lost 2 or more life this turn, you may put a quest counter on CARDNAME. (Damage causes loss of life.)\nWhenever a card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, if CARDNAME has three or more quest counters on it, you may have that player lose 2 life. If you do, you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 在每个结束步骤开始时，若有对手本回合失去过2点或更多生命，则你可以在CARDNAME上放置一个探索指示物。（伤害会导致失去生命。） 每当一张牌从任何区域进入对手的坟墓场时，若CARDNAME上有三个或更多探索指示物，则你可以令该牌手失去2点生命。若你如此作，则你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·141 | Cadaver Imp | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The mouth must be pried open before rigor mortis sets in. Otherwise the returning soul can find no ingress.
trans-unit.target: 在死尸僵硬之前，必须先把嘴给撬开；否则返回的灵魂会找不到入口。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·142 | Carrier Thrall | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: CMM·142 | Carrier Thrall | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Later we will mourn those we have lost. First we must end their suffering."\n—Drana, Kalastria bloodchief

trans-unit.source: Even when the flesh grows cold, knowledge waits in the bones for a master to release it.
trans-unit.target: 纵使肉身渐寒，知识仍会存于骸骨之中，等待大师发掘。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·149 | Demon's Disciple | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Taborax's cultists are the latest in a long history of beings who have desired to see Zendikar torn to pieces.
trans-unit.target: 悠悠历史长河中，曾有无数势力希望眼见赞迪卡彻底毁灭；塔博锐教众是其中最新一支。

trans-unit.source: Beware the generosity of demons.
trans-unit.target: 当恶魔慷慨时，你可要当心。

trans-unit.source: Demonlord Belzenlok
trans-unit.target: 恶魔领主贝赞洛

trans-unit.resname: CMM·151 | Demonlord Belzenlok | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying, trample\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card, then put that card into your hand. If the card's mana value is 4 or greater, repeat this process. CARDNAME deals 1 damage to you for each card put into your hand this way.
trans-unit.target: 飞行，践踏 当CARDNAME进战场时，从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张非地牌为止，然后将该牌置于你手上。若该牌的法术力值等于或大于4，则重复此流程。每以此法将一张牌置于你手上，CARDNAME便对你造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·152 | Dread Drone | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dread Drone
trans-unit.target: 可怖奴兽

trans-unit.resname: CMM·152 | Dread Drone | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出两个0/1无色奥札奇／后裔衍生生物。它们具有「牺牲此生物：加{C}。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·152 | Dread Drone | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Each Eldrazi ancient spawned a lineage of horrors in unfathomable shapes.
trans-unit.target: 每个奥札奇先祖所繁衍的惊惧兽，都各有难以想像的外貌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·153 | Dread Return | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dread Return
trans-unit.target: 颤栗再现

trans-unit.resname: CMM·153 | Dread Return | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.\nFlashback—\nSacrifice three creatures. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。 返照～牺牲三个生物。（你可以从你坟墓场中施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·153 | Dread Return | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Those who forget the horrors of the past are doomed to re-meet them.
trans-unit.target: 忘却过往梦魇的人，注定倒霉要再度碰上。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·154 | Drown in Sorrow | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Drown in Sorrow
trans-unit.target: 陷入悲痛

trans-unit.resname: CMM·154 | Drown in Sorrow | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Scry 1.
trans-unit.target: 所有生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。占卜1。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·154 | Drown in Sorrow | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The sad truth is that the whip of Erebos is long enough to wrap around all our throats."\n—Perisophia the philosopher
trans-unit.target: 「不幸的是，厄睿柏斯的鞭子长到足以勒住我们所有人的脖子。」 ～哲人珀里索菲娅

trans-unit.resname: CMM·155 | Endrek Sahr, Master Breeder | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Endrek Sahr, Master Breeder
trans-unit.target: 培育师恩德瑞克萨尔

trans-unit.resname: CMM·155 | Endrek Sahr, Master Breeder | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a creature spell, create X 1/1 black Thrull creature tokens, where X is that spell's mana value.\nWhen you control seven or more Thrulls, sacrifice CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放生物咒语时，派出X个1/1黑色索尔兽衍生生物，X为该咒语的法术力值。 当你操控七个或更多索尔兽时，牺牲CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·155 | Endrek Sahr, Master Breeder | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Creator of life, bringer of death.
trans-unit.target: 创造新生，引致死亡。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·156 | Exsanguinate | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Exsanguinate
trans-unit.target: 放干鲜血

trans-unit.resname: CMM·156 | Exsanguinate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each opponent loses X life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
trans-unit.target: 每位对手各失去X点生命。你获得若干生命，其数量等同于以此法失去的生命总和。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·156 | Exsanguinate | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I didn't say I would help you find your way home. I said I would help you finish your adventure."
trans-unit.target: 「我没说会帮你找路回家。而是说会助你结束冒险。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·157 | Extinguish All Hope | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Extinguish All Hope
trans-unit.target: 浇熄希望

trans-unit.resname: CMM·157 | Extinguish All Hope | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy all nonenchantment creatures.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有非结界生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·157 | Extinguish All Hope | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Phenax, god of deception, offered the soldiers protection from every poison on Theros. He saw no need to mention that Pharika's poisons were drawn from Nyx.
trans-unit.target: 欺瞒神斐纳克保佑士兵免受塞洛斯百毒侵袭。他觉得无需提醒芳瑞卡手中乃是尼兹之毒。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·158 | Feast of Succession | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Feast of Succession
trans-unit.target: 继位盛宴

trans-unit.resname: CMM·158 | Feast of Succession | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: All creatures get -4/-4 until end of turn. You become the monarch.
trans-unit.target: 所有生物得-4/-4直到回合结束。你成为君主。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·158 | Feast of Succession | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Beware the eager host."\n—Eligeth, crossroads augur
trans-unit.target: 「当心急不可耐的主人。」 ～歧路卜算师艾力思

trans-unit.resname: CMM·159 | Feed the Swarm | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Feed the Swarm
trans-unit.target: 喂饱虫群

trans-unit.resname: CMM·159 | Feed the Swarm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature or enchantment an opponent controls. You lose life equal to that permanent's mana value.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标由对手操控的生物或结界。你失去等同于该永久物之法术力值的生命。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·159 | Feed the Swarm | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "On vile wings and bloody wind, the swarm will rise."\n—Skyclave inscription
trans-unit.target: 「邪翼蔽日，血雨腥风，虫群必将崛起。」 ～空境铭文

trans-unit.resname: CMM·160 | Final Parting | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Final Parting
trans-unit.target: 生离死别

trans-unit.resname: CMM·160 | Final Parting | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for two cards. Put one into your hand and the other into your graveyard. Then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 从你牌库中搜寻两张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，另一张则置入你的坟墓场。然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·160 | Final Parting | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Sleep now, brother. That is the one gift I can give you."\n—Liliana Vess
trans-unit.target: 「安息吧，哥哥。这便是我能送你的礼物。」 ～莉莲娜维斯

trans-unit.resname: CMM·161 | Ghoulcaller Gisa | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ghoulcaller Gisa
trans-unit.target: 尸鬼牧者基沙

trans-unit.resname: CMM·161 | Ghoulcaller Gisa | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Create X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.
trans-unit.target: {B}，{T}，牺牲另一个生物：派出X个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物，X为所牺牲生物的力量。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·161 | Ghoulcaller Gisa | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Geralf, must you always whine? I agreed to nothing. I'll raise ghouls anytime I wish."
trans-unit.target: 「基拉夫，你非得喋喋不休吗？我什么都不同意。我要什么时候召唤食尸鬼，就什么时候召唤。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·162 | Gonti, Lord of Luxury | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gonti, Lord of Luxury
trans-unit.target: 奢华领主贡提

trans-unit.resname: CMM·162 | Gonti, Lord of Luxury | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of target opponent's library, exile one of them face down, then put the rest on the bottom of that library in a random order. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast it.
trans-unit.target: 死触 当CARDNAME进战场时，检视目标对手牌库顶的四张牌，将其中一张牌面朝下地放逐，然后将其余的牌以随机顺序置于该牌库底。于该牌持续放逐的时段内，你可以施放该牌，且能用任意种类的法术力来施放。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·163 | Goremand | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Goremand
trans-unit.target: 嗜血餮魔

trans-unit.resname: CMM·163 | Goremand | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.\nFlying, trample\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。 飞行，践踏 当CARDNAME进战场时，每位对手各牺牲一个生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·164 | Gorex, the Tombshell | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gorex, the Tombshell
trans-unit.target: 驮墓龟高雷兹

trans-unit.resname: CMM·164 | Gorex, the Tombshell | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may exile any number of creature cards from your graveyard. This spell costs {2} less to cast for each card exiled this way.\nDeathtouch\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks or dies, choose a card at random exiled with Gorex and put that card into its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 你可以从你坟墓场放逐任意数量的生物牌，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。每以此法放逐一张牌，此咒语便减少{2}来施放。 死触 每当CARDNAME攻击或死去时，随机选择一张以高雷兹放逐的牌，并将该牌置于其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·165 | Grave Pact | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Grave Pact
trans-unit.target: 墓约

trans-unit.resname: CMM·165 | Grave Pact | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control dies, each other player sacrifices a creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物死去时，每位其他牌手各牺牲一个生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·165 | Grave Pact | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Denied the peace of the Blessed Sleep, geists lash out at the living, and the cycle of anger and unrest continues unbroken.
trans-unit.target: 未得受福安眠的不息游魂会向生者发难，这一愤怒无歇的循环正因此永续不断。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·166 | Heartless Act | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Heartless Act
trans-unit.target: 无情手段

trans-unit.resname: CMM·166 | Heartless Act | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Choose one —\n• Destroy target creature with no counters on it.\n• Remove up to three counters from target creature.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～ •消灭目标其上没有指示物的生物。 •从目标生物上移去至多三个指示物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·166 | Heartless Act | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It's them or us."\n—General Kudro
trans-unit.target: 「不是它们死，就是我们亡。」 ～寇卓将军

trans-unit.resname: CMM·167 | Imp's Mischief | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Imp's Mischief
trans-unit.target: 小恶魔的作弄

trans-unit.resname: CMM·167 | Imp's Mischief | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Change the target of target spell with a single target. You lose life equal to that spell's mana value.
trans-unit.target: 为仅指定单一目标的目标咒语更改目标。你失去等同于该咒语法术力值的生命。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·167 | Imp's Mischief | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Do the innocent pay for the crimes of the guilty? Of course they do. That's the fate of the weak."\n—Nicol Bolas
trans-unit.target: 「无辜者是否替恶人罪行付出代价？当然要。弱者命本如此。」 ～尼可波拉斯

trans-unit.resname: CMM·168 | Isareth the Awakener | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Isareth the Awakener
trans-unit.target: 唤尸依萨蕾

trans-unit.resname: CMM·168 | Isareth the Awakener | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, you may pay {X}. When you do, return target creature card with mana value X from your graveyard to the battlefield with a corpse counter on it. If that creature would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else.
trans-unit.target: 死触 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以支付{X}。当你如此作时，将目标法术力值为X的生物牌从你坟墓场移回战场，且上面有一个尸体指示物。如果该生物将离开战场，则改为将它放逐，而非置入其他区域。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·169 | Kindred Dominance | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kindred Dominance
trans-unit.target: 同族霸权

trans-unit.resname: CMM·169 | Kindred Dominance | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose a creature type. Destroy all creatures that aren't of the chosen type.
trans-unit.target: 选择一种生物类别。消灭所有不为该类别的生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·169 | Kindred Dominance | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In the end, the lights fade, the land withers, and only the dead and vile remain.
trans-unit.target: 最终，明光消逝，地貌凋零，唯亡者与恶徒永存。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·170 | Legion Vanguard | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Legion Vanguard
trans-unit.target: 军团先锋

trans-unit.resname: CMM·170 | Legion Vanguard | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: CARDNAME explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: {1}，牺牲另一个生物：令CARDNAME勘察。（展示你的牌库顶牌。如果该牌是地，则置于你手上。若否，则在此生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物，然后将所展示的牌放回原位或置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·170 | Legion Vanguard | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It takes guts to be a trailblazer.
trans-unit.target: 领路人得有好胆量。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·171 | Lotleth Giant | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lotleth Giant
trans-unit.target: 洛特离巨人

trans-unit.resname: CMM·171 | Lotleth Giant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Undergrowth — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target opponent for each creature card in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 朽力～当CARDNAME进战场时，选择目标对手。你坟墓场中每有一张生物牌，它便对该牌手造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·171 | Lotleth Giant | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I prefer the big and looming to the small and skittering."\n—Cevraya, Golgari shaman
trans-unit.target: 「相比渺小掠行的生物，我更喜欢大到遮天的那种。」 ～葛加理祭师习拉雅

trans-unit.resname: CMM·172 | Loyal Subordinate | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Loyal Subordinate
trans-unit.target: 忠诚副手

trans-unit.resname: CMM·172 | Loyal Subordinate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)\nLieutenant — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, each opponent loses 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 威慑（此生物只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。） 副官～在你回合的战斗开始时，若你操控你的指挥官，则每位对手各失去3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·172 | Loyal Subordinate | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Zombies work best when they're fed appropriately, so it's prudent to let them eat on the job.
trans-unit.target: 灵俑吃饱时效率最高，因此让它们边工作边进食乃审慎决定。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·173 | Mikaeus, the Unhallowed | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mikaeus, the Unhallowed
trans-unit.target: 孽物米凯耶

trans-unit.resname: CMM·173 | Mikaeus, the Unhallowed | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Intimidate\nWhenever a Human deals damage to you, destroy it.\nOther non-Human creatures you control get +1/+1 and have undying. (When a creature with undying dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: 威吓 每当一个人类对你造成伤害时，将它消灭。 由你操控的其他非人类生物得+1/+1且具有不息异能。（当具不息异能的生物死去时，若其上没有+1/+1指示物，则将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场，且其上有一个+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·174 | Mire Triton | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mire Triton
trans-unit.target: 泥沼屈东

trans-unit.resname: CMM·174 | Mire Triton | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, mill two cards and you gain 2 life. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 死触 当CARDNAME进战场时，磨两张牌且你获得2点生命。（磨一张牌的流程是将你牌库顶的牌置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·174 | Mire Triton | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Caught between life and death, between land and sea, between thought and oblivion.
trans-unit.target: 徘徊在生与死、地与海、忆与忘之间。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·175 | Nadier's Nightblade | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Nadier's Nightblade
trans-unit.target: 纳迪尔的夜刃手

trans-unit.resname: CMM·175 | Nadier's Nightblade | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a token you control leaves the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的衍生物离开战场时，每位对手各失去1点生命且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·175 | Nadier's Nightblade | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Checking around every corner doesn't help if you forget to look up.
trans-unit.target: 你要是忘了向上瞧一瞧，四下检查得再仔细也没用。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·176 | Ob Nixilis of the Black Oath | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ob Nixilis of the Black Oath
trans-unit.target: 黯约者欧尼希兹

trans-unit.resname: CMM·176 | Ob Nixilis of the Black Oath | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
+2: Each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
−2: Create a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying. You lose 2 life.
−8: You get an emblem with "{1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain X life and draw X cards, where X is the sacrificed creature's power."
CARDNAME can be your commander.
trans-unit.target: +2：每位对手各失去1点生命。你获得若干生命，其数量等同于以此法失去的生命总和。 −2：派出一个5/5黑色，具飞行异能的恶魔衍生生物。你失去2点生命。 −8：你获得具有以下异能的徽记～「{1}{B}，牺牲一个生物：你获得X点生命且抓X张牌，X为所牺牲生物的力量。」 CARDNAME可用作指挥官。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·177 | Ogre Slumlord | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ogre Slumlord
trans-unit.target: 贫窟霸食人魔

trans-unit.resname: CMM·177 | Ogre Slumlord | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever another nontoken creature dies, you may create a 1/1 black Rat creature token.\nRats you control have deathtouch.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个非衍生物的生物死去时，你可以派出一个1/1黑色老鼠衍生生物。 由你操控的老鼠具有死触异能。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·177 | Ogre Slumlord | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "His tenement is filled with the most vile, disgusting vermin. It's infested with rats, too."\n—Branko One-Ear
trans-unit.target: 「他的居所充满最邪恶恶心的病媒，还有鼠辈横行。」 ～单耳布兰可

trans-unit.resname: CMM·178 | Phyrexian Gargantua | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Gargantua
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚巨罡兽

trans-unit.resname: CMM·178 | Phyrexian Gargantua | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you draw two cards and you lose 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你抓两张牌且失去2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·178 | Phyrexian Gargantua | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Other Phyrexians have nightmares about the gargantua.
trans-unit.target: 其他的非瑞克西亚人，都曾在恶梦中见过这巨兽。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·179 | Priest of the Blood Rite | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Priest of the Blood Rite
trans-unit.target: 血仪僧侣

trans-unit.resname: CMM·179 | Priest of the Blood Rite | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个5/5黑色，具飞行异能的恶魔衍生生物。 在你的维持开始时，你失去2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·179 | Priest of the Blood Rite | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Some will sacrifice everything for but a taste of power.
trans-unit.target: 有人愿意舍弃一切，只为品尝力量的滋味。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·180 | Rankle, Master of Pranks | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rankle, Master of Pranks
trans-unit.target: 恶戏之王兰卡

Flying, haste
Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, choose any number —

• Each player loses 1 life and draws a card.
• Each player sacrifices a creature.

trans-unit.target: 源火斗士

trans-unit.resname: CMM·210 | Champion of the Flame | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nCARDNAME gets +2/+2 for each Aura and Equipment attached to it.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 CARDNAME上每贴附一个灵气或武具，便得+2/+2。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·210 | Champion of the Flame | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Grand Warlord Radha's challengers are always defeated, but she rewards the most passionate with the Flame of Keld. After that, they burn for her.
trans-unit.target: 挑战大军阀拉妲的人悉数落败，但她会以凯尔顿源火奖励表现最激昂者。此后，他们便为她而燃烧。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·211 | Crimson Fleet Commodore | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Crimson Fleet Commodore
trans-unit.target: 绯红舰队准将

trans-unit.resname: CMM·211 | Crimson Fleet Commodore | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 当CARDNAME进战场时，你成为君主。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·211 | Crimson Fleet Commodore | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Kindly steer your fleet clear of the waters west of Scrub Isle. It would be a shame to incinerate such exquisite maritime craftsmanship."\n—Commodore Axurik, to Admiral Yelise
trans-unit.target: 「恳请贵舰速离斯鲁巴岛以西水域。此等精致画舫倘若付之一炬，甚为至憾。」 ～亚胥雷准将讯告耶莉兹总帅

trans-unit.resname: CMM·212 | Cyclops Electromancer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, it deals X damage to target creature an opponent controls, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，它向目标由对手操控的生物造成X点伤害，X为你坟墓场中瞬间与法术牌的数量加总。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·212 | Cyclops Electromancer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Every storm has an eye.
trans-unit.target: 每场风暴都有暴风眼。

trans-unit.source: Daretti, Scrap Savant

trans-unit.resname: CMM·213 | Daretti, Scrap Savant | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
+2: Discard up to two cards, then draw that many cards.
−2: Sacrifice an artifact. If you do, return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
−10: You get an emblem with "Whenever an artifact is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return that card to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step."
CARDNAME can be your commander.
trans-unit.target: +2：弃至多两张牌，然后抓等量的牌。 −2：牺牲一个神器。如果你如此作，则将目标神器牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。 −10：你获得具有以下异能的徽记～「每当一个神器从战场进入你的坟墓场，在下一个结束步骤开始时，将该牌移回战场。」 CARDNAME可用作指挥官。

trans-unit.source: Deflecting Swat
trans-unit.target: 偏转击

trans-unit.resname: CMM·214 | Deflecting Swat | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: If you control a commander, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost.\nYou may choose new targets for target spell or ability.
trans-unit.target: 如果你操控指挥官，则你可以施放此咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。 你可以为目标咒语或异能选择新的目标。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·214 | Deflecting Swat | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Archmage attacks are little more than annoyances to Kalamax.
trans-unit.target: 在卡勒麦眼中，大法师的攻击也不过只是烦人的雕虫小技。

trans-unit.target: 礼数不周

trans-unit.resname: CMM·215 | Disrupt Decorum | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Goad all creatures you don't control. (Until your next turn, those creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)
trans-unit.target: 煽惑所有不由你操控的生物。（直到你的下一个回合，那些生物每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击，且若能攻击除你以外的牌手，则必须如此作。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·215 | Disrupt Decorum | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Dinner and politics don't mix.
trans-unit.target: 餐宴议事难两全。

trans-unit.target: 趋异转化

trans-unit.resname: CMM·216 | Divergent Transformations | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Undaunted (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each opponent.)\nExile two target creatures. For each of those creatures, its controller reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a creature card, puts that card onto the battlefield, then shuffles the rest into their library.
trans-unit.target: 不屈（每有一位对手，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。） 放逐两个目标生物。对每个这类生物而言，其操控者从其牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张生物牌为止，将该牌放进战场，然后将其余的牌洗入其牌库。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·217 | Dragon Fodder | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Atarka goblins meet their demise as readily as their Temur counterparts did, but usually under big, winged shadows.
trans-unit.target: 安塔卡族的鬼怪和他们铁木尔的同胞一样随时准备赴死，但他们通常死在大型的有翼阴影之下。

Until end of turn, you may cast that card and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.

trans-unit.source: Choose land or nonland. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

trans-unit.source: "Gaea knows what you need. Do you?"
trans-unit.target: 「盖亚知道你需要什么。你自己知道吗？」

trans-unit.source: Every movement is a summons—even your screams.

trans-unit.resname: CMM·273 | Armorcraft Judge | Flavor Text

trans-unit.resname: CMM·274 | Azusa, Lost but Seeking | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I do not miss Jukai Forest. It is not my home. My home is Kamigawa, its people my family. Wherever I set my pack and rest my head, I am home."
trans-unit.target: 「我并不怀念树海。我的家乡不是树海，而是整个神河；神河子民都是我的家人。不论我栖身何处，都像是回到了家。」

trans-unit.source: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a 2/2 green Cat creature token.\n{4}{G}{G}: Until end of turn, creatures you control have base power and toughness X/X, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

trans-unit.resname: CMM·299 | Jolrael, Mwonvuli Recluse | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Humans bring nothing but suffering and deceit. They are not welcome in my forest."

trans-unit.source: Whenever a Saproling you control dies, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.\n{4}: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的腐生物死去时，CARDNAME向每位对手各造成1点伤害且你获得1点生命。 {4}：派出一个1/1绿色腐生物衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·356 | Slimefoot, the Stowaway | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As Jhoira restored the *Weatherlight*, a mushroom growing in its hold unexpectedly became her first crew member.
trans-unit.target: 正当尤依拉修整晴空号之时，舱内成长的一株蘑菇意外地成了她的首名船员。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·357 | Taigam, Sidisi's Hand | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Taigam, Sidisi's Hand
trans-unit.target: 谢迪西副手泰伽姆

trans-unit.resname: CMM·357 | Taigam, Sidisi's Hand | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Skip your draw step.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.\n{B}, {T}, Exile X cards from your graveyard: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 略过你的抓牌步骤。 在你的维持开始时，检视你牌库顶的三张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，其余则置入你的坟墓场。 {B}，{T}，从你的坟墓场放逐X张牌：目标生物得-X/-X直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·358 | Tatyova, Benthic Druid | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 深洋德鲁伊塔托娃

trans-unit.resname: CMM·358 | Tatyova, Benthic Druid | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life and draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，你获得1点生命且抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·358 | Tatyova, Benthic Druid | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Yavimaya is one being—one vastness of rippling leaves, one deepness of roots, and one chatter of animals—of which I am one part."
trans-unit.target: 「亚维马雅本身即是一个活体～一片无际叶脉波澜，一组纵深树木繁根，一群喧嚣动物嘶吼～而我也是其中之一。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·359 | Teysa Karlov | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 泰莎卡洛夫

trans-unit.resname: CMM·359 | Teysa Karlov | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: If a creature dying causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.\nCreature tokens you control have vigilance and lifelink.
trans-unit.target: 如果由你操控之永久物具有的触发式异能因生物死去而触发，则该异能额外触发一次。 由你操控的衍生生物具有警戒与系命异能。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·359 | Teysa Karlov | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: While Kaya is guildmaster, Teysa waits patiently at the center of the Orzhov web of power.
trans-unit.target: 卡娅当上公会首领后，泰莎就在欧佐夫权力网的中心静观其变。

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield under the control of an opponent of your choice.\nXantcha attacks each combat if able and can't attack its owner or planeswalkers its owner controls.\n{3}: Xantcha's controller loses 2 life and you draw a card. Any player may activate this ability.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一位对手。珊迦在该牌手的操控下进战场。 珊迦每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击；且珊迦不能攻击其拥有者或由其拥有者操控的鹏洛客。 {3}：珊迦的操控者失去2点生命且你抓一张牌。任何牌手均可以起动此异能。

trans-unit.target: 飞行，警戒，威慑 每当CARDNAME攻击时，展示你的牌库顶牌。如果它的法术力值为奇数，则你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。若你未施放它，则抓一张牌。

Each opponent loses life equal to that card's mana value.
