trans-unit.resname: CMM·464 | Land Tax | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，若某对手操控的地比你多，则你可以从你牌库中搜寻至多三张基本地牌，展示这些牌，将它们置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·465 | Loyal Retainers | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Loyal Retainers
trans-unit.target: 忠臣

trans-unit.resname: CMM·465 | Loyal Retainers | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice CARDNAME: Return target legendary creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only during your turn, before attackers are declared.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲CARDNAME：将目标传奇生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。只能于你的回合中、宣告攻击者之前起动。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·465 | Loyal Retainers | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Because sometimes the greatest enemy is paperwork.
trans-unit.target: 毕竟最大的敌人有时候是文书工作。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·466 | Mangara, the Diplomat | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mangara, the Diplomat
trans-unit.target: 使节曼格拉

trans-unit.resname: CMM·466 | Mangara, the Diplomat | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Lifelink\nWhenever an opponent attacks with creatures, if two or more of those creatures are attacking you and/or planeswalkers you control, draw a card.\nWhenever an opponent casts their second spell each turn, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 系命 每当任一对手以生物攻击时，若其中有两个或更多生物攻击你和／或由你操控的鹏洛客，则你抓一张牌。 每当任一对手施放每回合中其第二个咒语时，你抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·467 | Nahiri, the Lithomancer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Nahiri, the Lithomancer
trans-unit.target: 砾岩术士娜希丽

trans-unit.resname: CMM·467 | Nahiri, the Lithomancer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
+2: Create a 1/1 white Kor Soldier creature token. You may attach an Equipment you control to it.
−2: You may put an Equipment card from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield.
−10: Create a colorless Equipment artifact token named Stoneforged Blade. It has indestructible, "Equipped creature gets +5/+5 and has double strike," and equip {0}.
CARDNAME can be your commander.
trans-unit.target: +2：派出一个1/1白色寇族／士兵衍生生物。你可以将一个由你操控的武具贴附于其上。 −2：你可以将一张武具牌从你手上或坟墓场放进战场。 −10：派出一个名称为锻石砾刃的无色武具衍生神器。它具有不灭，「佩带此武具的生物得+5/+5且具有连击异能」与佩带{0}。 CARDNAME可用作指挥官。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·468 | Odric, Master Tactician | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Odric, Master Tactician
trans-unit.target: 战术名家欧吉克

trans-unit.resname: CMM·468 | Odric, Master Tactician | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: First strike\nWhenever CARDNAME and at least three other creatures attack, you choose which creatures block this combat and how those creatures block.
trans-unit.target: 先攻 每当CARDNAME与至少三个其他生物攻击时，本次战斗中由你选择哪些生物来阻挡，以及它们如何阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·468 | Odric, Master Tactician | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Fear holds no place in faith's battle plan."
trans-unit.target: 「信念的战斗计划中不容恐惧侧身。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·469 | Puresteel Paladin | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Puresteel Paladin
trans-unit.target: 净钢神圣武士

trans-unit.resname: CMM·469 | Puresteel Paladin | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever an Equipment enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.\nMetalcraft — Equipment you control have equip {0} as long as you control three or more artifacts.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个武具在你的操控下进战场时，你可以抓一张牌。 金技～只要你操控三个或更多神器，由你操控的武具便具有佩带{0}。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·470 | Righteous Confluence | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Righteous Confluence
trans-unit.target: 正气交汇

trans-unit.resname: CMM·470 | Righteous Confluence | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.
• Create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.
• Exile target enchantment.
• You gain 5 life.
trans-unit.target: 选择三项。你可以多次选择同一项。 •派出一个2/2白色，具警戒异能的骑士衍生生物。 •放逐目标结界。 •你获得5点生命。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·471 | Sephara, Sky's Blade | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sephara, Sky's Blade
trans-unit.target: 驭空刃席斐拉

trans-unit.resname: CMM·471 | Sephara, Sky's Blade | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You may pay {W} and tap four untapped creatures you control with flying rather than pay this spell's mana cost.\nFlying, lifelink\nOther creatures you control with flying have indestructible.
trans-unit.target: 你可以支付{W}并横置四个由你操控、具飞行异能且未横置的生物，而不支付此咒语的法术力费用。 飞行，系命 由你操控且具飞行异能的其他生物具有不灭异能。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·472 | Sevinne's Reclamation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sevinne's Reclamation
trans-unit.target: 瑟纹的复还

trans-unit.resname: CMM·472 | Sevinne's Reclamation | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Return target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. If this spell was cast from a graveyard, you may copy this spell and may choose a new target for the copy.\nFlashback {4}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 将目标法术力值等于或小于3的永久物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。如果此咒语是从坟墓场施放，则你可以复制此咒语，且可以为该复制品选择新的目标。 返照{4}{W}（你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·473 | Smothering Tithe | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Smothering Tithe
trans-unit.target: 税赋压身

trans-unit.resname: CMM·473 | Smothering Tithe | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent draws a card, that player may pay {2}. If the player doesn't, you create a Treasure token.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手抓一张牌时，该牌手可以支付{2}。若该牌手未如此作，则你派出一个珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·473 | Smothering Tithe | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I await your donation."\n—Dasha, Orzhov priest
trans-unit.target: 「我在等你的馈赠。」 ～欧佐夫僧侣达莎

trans-unit.resname: CMM·474 | Steelshaper's Gift | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Steelshaper's Gift
trans-unit.target: 塑铁军之天赋

trans-unit.resname: CMM·474 | Steelshaper's Gift | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for an Equipment card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 从你牌库中搜寻一张武具牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·474 | Steelshaper's Gift | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Some blades seek their own wielders.
trans-unit.target: 有些刀剑就是会认主人。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·475 | Sublime Exhalation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sublime Exhalation
trans-unit.target: 升灵吐息

trans-unit.resname: CMM·475 | Sublime Exhalation | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Undaunted (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each opponent.)\nDestroy all creatures.
trans-unit.target: 不屈（每有一位对手，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。） 消灭所有生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·475 | Sublime Exhalation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Exhale, and let the winds carry your soul for all eternity.
trans-unit.target: 深呼吸，令清风承灵魂往永生。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·476 | Wakening Sun's Avatar | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wakening Sun's Avatar
trans-unit.target: 晓阳化身

trans-unit.resname: CMM·476 | Wakening Sun's Avatar | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, destroy all non-Dinosaur creatures.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，若你从你手上施放之，则消灭所有非恐龙生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·476 | Wakening Sun's Avatar | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Kinjalli's encompassing rays herald new life in the moment of the sun's dawning."\n—Chitlati, Lightning Rider
trans-unit.target: 「太阳破晓时，津加理光芒笼罩万物，召引新生。」 ～迅雷龙骑奇拉蒂

trans-unit.resname: CMM·477 | Wrath of God | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wrath of God
trans-unit.target: 神之愤怒

trans-unit.resname: CMM·477 | Wrath of God | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有生物。它们不能重生。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·477 | Wrath of God | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Legend speaks of the lost coastal polis of Olantin, whose inhabitants' hubris enraged the sun god Heliod.
trans-unit.target: 传说中，海滨城邦欧兰廷人才济济但傲气盖天，因此触怒了太阳神赫利欧德，致使此地历史就此亡佚。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·478 | Zetalpa, Primal Dawn | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Zetalpa, Primal Dawn
trans-unit.target: 始辉泽塔帕

trans-unit.resname: CMM·478 | Zetalpa, Primal Dawn | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, double strike, vigilance, trample, indestructible
trans-unit.target: 飞行，连击，警戒，践踏，不灭

trans-unit.resname: CMM·478 | Zetalpa, Primal Dawn | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The sky takes flight and the earth trembles.
trans-unit.target: 天空逃散，大地震颤。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·479 | Aminatou's Augury | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Aminatou's Augury
trans-unit.target: 阿米娜图的卜算

trans-unit.resname: CMM·479 | Aminatou's Augury | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile the top eight cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield. Until end of turn, for each nonland card type, you may cast a spell of that type from among the exiled cards without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 放逐你牌库顶的八张牌。你可以将其中一张地牌放进战场。直到回合结束，对每种非地之牌张类别而言，你可以从所放逐的牌之中施放一个该类别的咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·480 | Azami, Lady of Scrolls | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Azami, Lady of Scrolls
trans-unit.target: 万卷蓟夫人

trans-unit.resname: CMM·480 | Azami, Lady of Scrolls | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Tap an untapped Wizard you control: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 横置一个由你操控且未横置的法术师：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·480 | Azami, Lady of Scrolls | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Choices belong to those with the luxuries of time and distance. We have neither. I recommend we proceed with the plan to destroy all shrines of the kami."\n—Lady Azami, letter to Sensei Hisoka
trans-unit.target: 「选择这东西，是享有充分时间与距离者的特权；可惜这两者吾等均付之匮如。我建议采用的计划，就是消灭所有神明的祭祠。」 ～蓟夫人致密师范

trans-unit.resname: CMM·481 | Braids, Conjurer Adept | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Braids, Conjurer Adept
trans-unit.target: 咒法专家布蕾德

trans-unit.resname: CMM·481 | Braids, Conjurer Adept | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may put an artifact, creature, or land card from their hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的维持开始时，该牌手可以将一张神器，生物或地牌从其手上放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·481 | Braids, Conjurer Adept | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The rifted multiverse became a sea of conflicting realities, each peopled by possible versions of every living being.
trans-unit.target: 受时缝影响的多重宇宙里，现实彼此冲突，挤满了每个生灵各种可能成为的样貌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·482 | Bribery | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bribery
trans-unit.target: 贿赂

trans-unit.resname: CMM·482 | Bribery | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search target opponent's library for a creature card and put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles.
trans-unit.target: 从目标对手的牌库中搜寻一张生物牌，并将该牌在你的操控下放进战场。然后该牌手洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·482 | Bribery | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It seems your ticket is in order after all, ma'am."
trans-unit.target: 「女士，您的票看起来都没问题。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·483 | Capture of Jingzhou | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Capture of Jingzhou
trans-unit.target: 收复荆州

trans-unit.resname: CMM·483 | Capture of Jingzhou | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Take an extra turn after this one.
trans-unit.target: 于本回合后进行额外的一个回合。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·483 | Capture of Jingzhou | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The province of Jingzhou was the fulcrum of the three kingdoms. At separate times it was coveted and controlled by the Wu, the Shu, and the Wei.
trans-unit.target: 荆州在三国时期中是兵家必争之地，屡屡被魏国、蜀国及吴国垂涎。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·484 | Commandeer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Commandeer
trans-unit.target: 霸占

trans-unit.resname: CMM·484 | Commandeer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You may exile two blue cards from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.\nGain control of target noncreature spell. You may choose new targets for it.
trans-unit.target: 你可以从你手上放逐两张蓝色牌，而不支付此咒语的法术力费用。 获得目标非生物咒语的操控权。你可以为它选择新的目标。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·485 | Cyclonic Rift | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cyclonic Rift
trans-unit.target: 龙卷裂空

trans-unit.resname: CMM·485 | Cyclonic Rift | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.\nOverload {6}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")
trans-unit.target: 将目标不由你操控的非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。 超载{6}{U}（你可以支付此咒语的超载费用来施放它。若你如此作，则将其叙述中的「目标」更改为「每个」。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·485 | Cyclonic Rift | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Izzet specialize in unnatural disaster.
trans-unit.target: 伊捷以非天然灾害为业。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·486 | Day's Undoing | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Day's Undoing
trans-unit.target: 重启一日

trans-unit.resname: CMM·486 | Day's Undoing | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards. If it's your turn, end the turn. (Exile all spells and abilities from the stack, including this card. Discard down to your maximum hand size. Damage wears off, and "this turn" and "until end of turn" effects end.)
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手将其手牌与坟墓场洗入其牌库，然后各抓七张牌。如果是在你的回合中，则结束本回合。（放逐堆叠上的所有咒语和异能，包括此牌。你将手牌弃掉，直到满足手牌上限为止。生物上的伤害消失，并且注记着「本回合」与「直到回合结束」的效应均结束。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·487 | Evacuation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Evacuation
trans-unit.target: 逃难

trans-unit.resname: CMM·487 | Evacuation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return all creatures to their owners' hands.
trans-unit.target: 将所有生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·487 | Evacuation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Once I supply the breeze, you'll see your warriors for the smoke they truly are."\n—Alexi, zephyr mage
trans-unit.target: 「一旦我让风吹起，你会看到手下兵士如烟散去。」 ～西风法师阿蕾克丝

trans-unit.resname: CMM·488 | Faerie Artisans | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Faerie Artisans
trans-unit.target: 仙灵工匠

trans-unit.resname: CMM·488 | Faerie Artisans | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, create a token that's a copy of that creature except it's an artifact in addition to its other types. Then exile all other tokens created with CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当一个非衍生物的生物在对手操控下进战场时，派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为该生物的复制品，但额外具有神器此类别。然后放逐所有以CARDNAME派出的其他衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·489 | Fierce Guardianship | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fierce Guardianship
trans-unit.target: 厉行守护

trans-unit.resname: CMM·489 | Fierce Guardianship | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: If you control a commander, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost.\nCounter target noncreature spell.
trans-unit.target: 如果你操控指挥官，则你可以施放此咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。 反击目标非生物咒语。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·489 | Fierce Guardianship | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Hunt somewhere else. This is your only warning."\n—Gavi, nest warden
trans-unit.target: 「去别处打猎。我只警告这一次。」 ～巢穴护卫盖薇

trans-unit.resname: CMM·490 | Lorthos, the Tidemaker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lorthos, the Tidemaker
trans-unit.target: 兴潮罗佐司

trans-unit.resname: CMM·490 | Lorthos, the Tidemaker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, you may pay {8}. If you do, tap up to eight target permanents. Those permanents don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以支付{8}。若你如此作，则横置至多八个目标永久物。这些永久物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·490 | Lorthos, the Tidemaker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When Lorthos emerges from his deepwater realm, the tides bow to his will and the coastline cowers in his presence.
trans-unit.target: 罗佐司从其深海国度现身，潮浪为其意志而躬身行礼，海岸见其身形即畏缩奔逃。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·491 | Minds Aglow | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Minds Aglow
trans-unit.target: 心神光辉

trans-unit.resname: CMM·491 | Minds Aglow | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Join forces — Starting with you, each player may pay any amount of mana. Each player draws X cards, where X is the total amount of mana paid this way.
trans-unit.target: 携手～由你开始，每位牌手各可以支付任意数量的法术力。每位牌手各抓X张牌，X为以此法支付的法术力总数量。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·492 | Mystic Confluence | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mystic Confluence
trans-unit.target: 秘法交汇

trans-unit.resname: CMM·492 | Mystic Confluence | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.
• Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
• Return target creature to its owner's hand.
• Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 选择三项。你可以多次选择同一项。 •除非目标咒语的操控者支付{3}，否则反击之。 •将目标生物移回其拥有者手上。 •抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·493 | Personal Tutor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Personal Tutor
trans-unit.target: 个人导师

trans-unit.resname: CMM·493 | Personal Tutor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a sorcery card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.
trans-unit.target: 从你牌库中搜寻一张法术牌，展示该牌，然后洗牌，并将该牌置于牌库顶。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·493 | Personal Tutor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Lomelda had spent four semesters on the waitlist for Kasmina's Advanced Polymorphological Theory seminar. She was determined not to miss a word.
trans-unit.target: 洛梅达在等候名单上足足排了四个学期，才如愿修读克蜜娜的高阶变型原理课程。她决心绝不听漏一字。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·494 | Sai, Master Thopterist | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sai, Master Thopterist
trans-unit.target: 扑翼大师塞埃

trans-unit.resname: CMM·494 | Sai, Master Thopterist | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.\n{1}{U}, Sacrifice two artifacts: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放神器咒语时，派出一个1/1无色，具飞行异能的振翼机衍生神器生物。 {1}{U}，牺牲两个神器：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·494 | Sai, Master Thopterist | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Industry without artistry is just a fancy way to fill the junkyard."
trans-unit.target: 「量产品若不加修饰，产出物与垃圾无异。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·495 | Spellseeker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Spellseeker
trans-unit.target: 觅咒师

trans-unit.resname: CMM·495 | Spellseeker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an instant or sorcery card with mana value 2 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从你牌库中搜寻一张法术力值等于或小于2的瞬间或法术牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·495 | Spellseeker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Mages and warriors recruited from across Kylem display their skills at Valor's Reach.
trans-unit.target: 来自全凯勒姆的法师与战士在英勇巅各展身手。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·496 | Stitcher Geralf | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Stitcher Geralf
trans-unit.target: 拼接师基拉夫

trans-unit.resname: CMM·496 | Stitcher Geralf | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}{U}, {T}: Each player mills three cards. Exile up to two creature cards put into graveyards this way. Create an X/X blue Zombie creature token, where X is the total power of the cards exiled this way.
trans-unit.target: {2}{U}，{T}：每位牌手各磨三张牌。放逐至多两张以此法进入坟墓场的生物牌。派出一个X/X蓝色灵俑衍生生物，X为以此法放逐各牌的力量总和。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·497 | Stormsurge Kraken | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Stormsurge Kraken
trans-unit.target: 岚涛巨海兽

trans-unit.resname: CMM·497 | Stormsurge Kraken | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Hexproof\nLieutenant — As long as you control your commander, CARDNAME gets +2/+2 and has "Whenever CARDNAME becomes blocked, you may draw two cards."
trans-unit.target: 辟邪 副官～只要你操控你的指挥官，CARDNAME便得+2/+2且具有「每当CARDNAME被阻挡时，你可以抓两张牌。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·497 | Stormsurge Kraken | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Most see krakens as wantonly violent, failing to notice their meticulous attention to detail when dismantling a vessel.
trans-unit.target: 许多人都认为巨海怪只会恣意施暴，却从未注意到它们破坏船舶时的细腻讲究。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·498 | Sun Quan, Lord of Wu | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sun Quan, Lord of Wu
trans-unit.target: 吴国君主孙权

trans-unit.resname: CMM·498 | Sun Quan, Lord of Wu | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control have horsemanship. (They can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物具有马术异能。（它们只能被具马术异能的生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·498 | Sun Quan, Lord of Wu | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "One score and four he reigned, the Southland king: / A dragon coiled, a tiger poised below the mighty Yangtze."
trans-unit.target: 「二十四年兴大业，龙蟠虎踞在江东。」 （第一零八回 丁奉雪中奋短兵）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·499 | Talrand, Sky Summoner | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Talrand, Sky Summoner
trans-unit.target: 空召师陶岚

trans-unit.resname: CMM·499 | Talrand, Sky Summoner | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放瞬间或法术咒语时，派出一个2/2蓝色，具飞行异能的龙兽衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·499 | Talrand, Sky Summoner | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The seas are vast, but the skies are even more so. Why be content with one kingdom when I can rule them both?"
trans-unit.target: 「大海浩瀚，但天空更加无际。如果我能同时统治两者，又何必只安于其一？」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·500 | Teferi, Temporal Archmage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Teferi, Temporal Archmage
trans-unit.target: 时间大法师泰菲力

trans-unit.resname: CMM·500 | Teferi, Temporal Archmage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
+1: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.
−1: Untap up to four target permanents.
−10: You get an emblem with "You may activate loyalty abilities of planeswalkers you control on any player's turn any time you could cast an instant."
CARDNAME can be your commander.
trans-unit.target: +1：检视你牌库顶的两张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，另一张则置于你的牌库底。 −1：重置至多四个目标永久物。 −10：你获得具有以下异能的徽记～「你可以在任意牌手的回合中，于你能够施放瞬间的时机下，起动由你操控之鹏洛客的忠诚异能。」 CARDNAME可用作指挥官。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·501 | Torrential Gearhulk | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Torrential Gearhulk
trans-unit.target: 汹涌巨械

trans-unit.resname: CMM·501 | Torrential Gearhulk | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may cast target instant card from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从你坟墓场中施放目标瞬间牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。如果该咒语将进入你的坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·502 | Urza, Lord High Artificer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Urza, Lord High Artificer
trans-unit.target: 铸物勋爵克撒

trans-unit.resname: CMM·502 | Urza, Lord High Artificer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 colorless Construct artifact creature token with "This creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control."\nTap an untapped artifact you control: Add {U}.\n{5}: Shuffle your library, then exile the top card. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个0/0无色组构体衍生神器生物，且具有「你每操控一个神器，此生物便得+1/+1。」 横置一个由你操控且未横置的神器：加{U}。 {5}：将你的牌库洗牌，然后放逐顶牌。直到回合结束，你可以使用该牌且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·503 | Archfiend of Despair | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Archfiend of Despair
trans-unit.target: 绝望翼邪鬼

trans-unit.resname: CMM·503 | Archfiend of Despair | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nYour opponents can't gain life.\nAt the beginning of each end step, each opponent loses life equal to the life that player lost this turn. (Damage causes loss of life.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 所有对手都不能获得生命。 在每个结束步骤开始时，每位对手各失去等同于该牌手本回合中曾失去之数量的生命。（伤害会导致失去生命。）

trans-unit.resname: CMM·504 | Bloodchief Ascension | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bloodchief Ascension
trans-unit.target: 血侯腾扬

trans-unit.resname: CMM·504 | Bloodchief Ascension | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each end step, if an opponent lost 2 or more life this turn, you may put a quest counter on CARDNAME. (Damage causes loss of life.)\nWhenever a card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, if CARDNAME has three or more quest counters on it, you may have that player lose 2 life. If you do, you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 在每个结束步骤开始时，若有对手本回合失去过2点或更多生命，则你可以在CARDNAME上放置一个探索指示物。（伤害会导致失去生命。） 每当一张牌从任何区域进入对手的坟墓场时，若CARDNAME上有三个或更多探索指示物，则你可以令该牌手失去2点生命。若你如此作，则你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·505 | Chainer, Dementia Master | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chainer, Dementia Master
trans-unit.target: 惧像大师崔纳

trans-unit.resname: CMM·505 | Chainer, Dementia Master | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: All Nightmares get +1/+1.\n{B}{B}{B}, Pay 3 life: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is black and is a Nightmare in addition to its other creature types.\nWhen CARDNAME leaves the battlefield, exile all Nightmares.
trans-unit.target: 所有梦魇得+1/+1。 {B}{B}{B}，支付3点生命：将目标生物牌在你的操控下从坟墓场放进战场。该生物是黑色，且额外具有梦魇此生物类别。 当CARDNAME离开战场时，放逐所有梦魇。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·506 | Curtains' Call | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Curtains' Call
trans-unit.target: 谢幕演出

trans-unit.resname: CMM·506 | Curtains' Call | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Undaunted (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each opponent.)\nDestroy two target creatures.
trans-unit.target: 不屈（每有一位对手，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。） 消灭两个目标生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·506 | Curtains' Call | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We give the audience what they want."\n—Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue
trans-unit.target: 「我们要做的就是迎合观众。」 ～裘里剧团业主裘里

trans-unit.resname: CMM·507 | Deadly Rollick | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 致命嬉闹

trans-unit.resname: CMM·507 | Deadly Rollick | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: If you control a commander, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost.\nExile target creature.
trans-unit.target: 如果你操控指挥官，则你可以施放此咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。 放逐目标生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·507 | Deadly Rollick | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Otrimi was disappointed at how quickly its new friend got tired and stopped playing.
trans-unit.target: 欧崔米的新朋友很快就累得玩不动了，它很不开心。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·508 | Decree of Pain | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Decree of Pain
trans-unit.target: 苦痛的宣判

trans-unit.resname: CMM·508 | Decree of Pain | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated. Draw a card for each creature destroyed this way.\nCycling {3}{B}{B} ({3}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)\nWhen you cycle CARDNAME, all creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有生物。它们不能重生。每以此法消灭一个生物，便抓一张牌。 循环{3}{B}{B}（{3}{B}{B}，弃掉此牌：抓一张牌。） 当你循环CARDNAME时，所有生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·509 | Demonic Tutor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Demonic Tutor
trans-unit.target: 邪魔导师

trans-unit.resname: CMM·509 | Demonic Tutor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 从你牌库中搜寻一张牌，将该牌置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·509 | Demonic Tutor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Beware the generosity of demons.
trans-unit.target: 当恶魔慷慨时，你可要当心。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·510 | Demonlord Belzenlok | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Demonlord Belzenlok
trans-unit.target: 恶魔领主贝赞洛

trans-unit.resname: CMM·510 | Demonlord Belzenlok | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying, trample\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card, then put that card into your hand. If the card's mana value is 4 or greater, repeat this process. CARDNAME deals 1 damage to you for each card put into your hand this way.
trans-unit.target: 飞行，践踏 当CARDNAME进战场时，从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张非地牌为止，然后将该牌置于你手上。若该牌的法术力值等于或大于4，则重复此流程。每以此法将一张牌置于你手上，CARDNAME便对你造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·511 | Endrek Sahr, Master Breeder | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Endrek Sahr, Master Breeder
trans-unit.target: 培育师恩德瑞克萨尔

trans-unit.resname: CMM·511 | Endrek Sahr, Master Breeder | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a creature spell, create X 1/1 black Thrull creature tokens, where X is that spell's mana value.\nWhen you control seven or more Thrulls, sacrifice CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放生物咒语时，派出X个1/1黑色索尔兽衍生生物，X为该咒语的法术力值。 当你操控七个或更多索尔兽时，牺牲CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·511 | Endrek Sahr, Master Breeder | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Creator of life, bringer of death.
trans-unit.target: 创造新生，引致死亡。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·512 | Ghoulcaller Gisa | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ghoulcaller Gisa
trans-unit.target: 尸鬼牧者基沙

trans-unit.resname: CMM·512 | Ghoulcaller Gisa | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Create X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.
trans-unit.target: {B}，{T}，牺牲另一个生物：派出X个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物，X为所牺牲生物的力量。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·512 | Ghoulcaller Gisa | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Geralf, must you always whine? I agreed to nothing. I'll raise ghouls anytime I wish."
trans-unit.target: 「基拉夫，你非得喋喋不休吗？我什么都不同意。我要什么时候召唤食尸鬼，就什么时候召唤。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·513 | Grave Pact | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Grave Pact
trans-unit.target: 墓约

trans-unit.resname: CMM·513 | Grave Pact | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control dies, each other player sacrifices a creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物死去时，每位其他牌手各牺牲一个生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·513 | Grave Pact | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Denied the peace of the Blessed Sleep, geists lash out at the living, and the cycle of anger and unrest continues unbroken.
trans-unit.target: 未得受福安眠的不息游魂会向生者发难，这一愤怒无歇的循环正因此永续不断。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·514 | Imp's Mischief | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Imp's Mischief
trans-unit.target: 小恶魔的作弄

trans-unit.resname: CMM·514 | Imp's Mischief | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Change the target of target spell with a single target. You lose life equal to that spell's mana value.
trans-unit.target: 为仅指定单一目标的目标咒语更改目标。你失去等同于该咒语法术力值的生命。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·514 | Imp's Mischief | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Do the innocent pay for the crimes of the guilty? Of course they do. That's the fate of the weak."\n—Nicol Bolas
trans-unit.target: 「无辜者是否替恶人罪行付出代价？当然要。弱者命本如此。」 ～尼可波拉斯

trans-unit.source: Choose a creature type. Destroy all creatures that aren't of the chosen type.
trans-unit.target: 选择一种生物类别。消灭所有不为该类别的生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·515 | Kindred Dominance | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In the end, the lights fade, the land withers, and only the dead and vile remain.
trans-unit.target: 最终，明光消逝，地貌凋零，唯亡者与恶徒永存。

trans-unit.source: Mikaeus, the Unhallowed
trans-unit.target: 孽物米凯耶

trans-unit.resname: CMM·516 | Mikaeus, the Unhallowed | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Intimidate\nWhenever a Human deals damage to you, destroy it.\nOther non-Human creatures you control get +1/+1 and have undying. (When a creature with undying dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: 威吓 每当一个人类对你造成伤害时，将它消灭。 由你操控的其他非人类生物得+1/+1且具有不息异能。（当具不息异能的生物死去时，若其上没有+1/+1指示物，则将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场，且其上有一个+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.source:
+2: Each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
−2: Create a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying. You lose 2 life.
−8: You get an emblem with "{1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain X life and draw X cards, where X is the sacrificed creature's power."
CARDNAME can be your commander.

trans-unit.resname: CMM·518 | Ogre Slumlord | Flavor Text

Flying, haste
Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, choose any number —
• Each player discards a card.
• Each player loses 1 life and draws a card.
• Each player sacrifices a creature.
trans-unit.target: 飞行，敏捷 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，选择任意数量的模式～ •每位牌手各弃一张牌。 •每位牌手失去1点生命且各抓一张牌。 •每位牌手各牺牲一个生物。

trans-unit.source: Razaketh, the Foulblooded

trans-unit.target: 莉莲娜坚持要来阿芒凯，就是为了要对付和她立约的最后两个恶魔之一。

trans-unit.target: 飞行 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择两位牌手。 每当所选牌手其中一位受到伤害时，另一位也失去等量的生命。

trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 所结附的生物是昆虫神器生物，其基础力量与防御力为0/1，具有不灭异能，且失去所有其他异能、牌张类别和生物类别。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·626 | Path to Exile | Flavor Text

trans-unit.target: 由于向神明动手乃不祥之举，因此经验老道的法师想出了各种动口之策，来将他们请回灵界。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·627 | Puresteel Paladin | Flavor Text

trans-unit.target: 终归浮尘

trans-unit.resname: CMM·628 | Return to Dust | Flavor Text

trans-unit.target: 「有什么奇怪的？万物终会归返空无，这个只不过动作快了一些。」 ～塑时匠埃多林

trans-unit.resname: CMM·632 | Frantic Search | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: One half-written novel, a year's worth of lecture notes, and several grocery lists later, Shiori began to wonder if she'd hacked the wrong terminal.
trans-unit.target: 在浏览过一部未写完的小说、一整年的课堂笔记和几份购物清单之后，史织开始怀疑自己是不是骇错了终端。

trans-unit.target: 血侯腾扬

trans-unit.resname: CMM·636 | Bloodchief Ascension | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each end step, if an opponent lost 2 or more life this turn, you may put a quest counter on CARDNAME.\nWhenever a card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, if CARDNAME has three or more quest counters on it, you may have that player lose 2 life. If you do, you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 在每个结束步骤开始时，若有对手本回合失去过2点或更多生命，则你可以在CARDNAME上放置一个探索指示物。 每当一张牌从任何区域进入对手的坟墓场时，若CARDNAME上有三个或更多探索指示物，则你可以令该牌手失去2点生命。若你如此作，则你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·637 | Dread Return | Flavor Text

trans-unit.resname: CMM·638 | Exsanguinate | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 放干鲜血

trans-unit.resname: CMM·638 | Exsanguinate | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "A small sip here and a small sip there, and all of a sudden I need a new dance partner."
trans-unit.target: 「这边亲一下，那边吸一口，转眼便需新人来搭手。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·639 | Grave Pact | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Grave Pact
trans-unit.target: 墓约

trans-unit.resname: CMM·639 | Grave Pact | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物死去时，每位其他牌手各牺牲一个生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·639 | Grave Pact | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As the ritual neared its climax, the exultant cultists waited with bated breath, unaware of the looming consequences of the scroll's translation error.
trans-unit.target: 就在仪式行将到达高潮之际，欢欣教众全都屏气凝神静待结果，全然不知他们就要一起承担卷轴解读出错的苦果。

trans-unit.target: 同族霸权

trans-unit.resname: CMM·640 | Kindred Dominance | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose a creature type. Destroy all creatures that aren't of the chosen type.
trans-unit.target: 选择一种生物类别。消灭所有不为该类别的生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·640 | Kindred Dominance | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Today will end with a feast," gloated the dragon. And what a feast it was.
trans-unit.target: 「看来今天我能饱餐一顿了，」巨龙洋洋得意道。最后也确实成了一顿饱餐。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·641 | Nadier's Nightblade | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 纳迪尔的夜刃手

trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的衍生物离开战场时，每位对手各失去1点生命且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·641 | Nadier's Nightblade | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Keep looking up and you'll miss what's right in front of your face.
trans-unit.target: 如果你只顾着往头上看，就会错过近在脸前的东西。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·642 | Faithless Looting | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 丧信掠夺

trans-unit.resname: CMM·642 | Faithless Looting | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Draw two cards, then discard two cards.\nFlashback {2}{R}
trans-unit.target: 抓两张牌，然后弃两张牌。 返照{2}{R}

trans-unit.resname: CMM·642 | Faithless Looting | Flavor Text

trans-unit.target: 「要是他们真的不希望我来偷这东西的话，就不该用只有七层的防爆反魔玻璃来保护它。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·643 | Magus of the Wheel | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 崇轮贤者

trans-unit.resname: CMM·643 | Magus of the Wheel | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Each player discards their hand, then draws seven cards.
trans-unit.target: {1}{R}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：每位牌手弃掉其手牌，然后各抓七张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·643 | Magus of the Wheel | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Linear time? You may as well believe in triangular gravity!"
trans-unit.target: 「你觉得时间是线性的？那看来你也相信重力场是三角形的！」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·644 | Storm-Kiln Artist | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME gets +1/+0 for each artifact you control.\nMagecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, create a Treasure token.

trans-unit.resname: CMM·644 | Storm-Kiln Artist | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "First you summon the lightning, then you make it dance."
trans-unit.target: 「先召唤出闪电，然后令它起舞。」

trans-unit.resname: CMM·645 | Treasure Nabber | Card Name

trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent taps an artifact for mana, gain control of that artifact until the end of your next turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手横置一个神器以产生法术力时，你获得该神器的操控权直到你下一个回合的回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·645 | Treasure Nabber | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Opposable thumbs, opposable toes, prehensile tails, boundary issues . . . no treasure is safe from a goblin."\n—Captain Lannery Storm
trans-unit.target: 「拇指成双，脚趾成对，尾巴灵活，没大没小…什么宝贝都难防鬼怪。」 ～兰娜莉速腾船长

trans-unit.resname: CMM·646 | Vandalblast | Flavor Text

(When a creature with undying dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: 威吓 每当一个人类对你造成伤害时，将它消灭。 由你操控的其他非人类生物得+1/+1且具有不息异能。（当具不息异能的生物死去时，若其上没有+1/+1指示物，则将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场，且其上有一个+1/+1指示物。）

Until end of turn, you may cast that card and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，选择一项～ •煽惑目标由该牌手操控的生物。 •放逐该牌手的牌库顶牌。直到回合结束，你可以施放该牌，且你可以将法术力视同任意颜色的法术力来支付施放该咒语的费用。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·703 | Sol Ring | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Model? I'm insulted. It's by all reasonable metrics a fully functional planetary system, scaled down for easier study."\n—Urza, to Tawnos
trans-unit.target: 「你说这只是模型？太过分了。无论拿什么标准来看，这都是一个完整的行星系统，不过为方便研究而缩小了而已。」 ～克撒反驳达硌士

trans-unit.resname: CMM·706 | Commodore Guff | Card Name

trans-unit.note: 指挥官大师系列没有发行中文指挥官套牌产品，因而中文版不存在常规版本的新牌张，而只有扩画版本（出现在本系列的聚珍补充包中）。但鹏洛客牌和传纪牌因为牌框原因没有扩画版本，也就没有中文版本的实卡存在，中文翻译只存在于本系列的发布释疑中。这些卡牌包括：古夫准将、狱窖之战、几何策士泰佑、覆面判官伏罗诺斯、烈焰传承茜卓。

At the beginning of your end step, put a loyalty counter on another target planeswalker you control.

Sacrifice after III.)\nI, II — For each player, exile up to one target non-Saga, nonland permanent that player controls until CARDNAME leaves the battlefield.\nIII — Create Avacyn, a legendary 8/8 white Angel creature token with flying, vigilance, and indestructible.

trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a colorless creature card from your hand.\nExile each creature and planeswalker with mana value less than the revealed card's mana value.
trans-unit.target: 从你手上展示一张无色生物牌，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。 放逐所有法术力值比所展示之牌小的生物和鹏洛客。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·746 | Desecrate Reality | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: For each opponent, exile up to one target permanent that player controls with an even mana value. (Zero is even.)\nAdamant — If at least three colorless mana was spent to cast this spell, return a permanent card with an odd mana value from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 为每位对手各进行以下流程～放逐至多一个目标由该牌手操控且法术力值为偶数的永久物。（零是偶数。） 固色～如果施放此咒语时支付过至少三点无色法术力，则将一张法术力值为奇数的永久物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: CMM·747 | Flayer of Loyalties | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When you cast this spell, gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. Until end of turn, it has base power and toughness 10/10 and gains trample, annihilator 2, and haste.\nTrample, annihilator 2
trans-unit.target: 当你施放此咒语时，获得目标生物的操控权直到回合结束。重置该生物。直到回合结束，它的基础力量与防御力为10/10，且获得践踏、歼灭2与敏捷异能。 践踏，歼灭2

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.\nWhenever you put one or more +1/+1 counters on another colorless creature, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Omarthis.\nWhen Omarthis dies, manifest a number of cards from the top of your library equal to the number of counters on it.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有X个+1/+1指示物。 每当你在另一个无色生物上放置一个或数个+1/+1指示物时，你可以在欧玛迪斯上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 当欧玛迪斯死去时，显化你牌库顶若干牌，其数量等同于其上的指示物数量。

trans-unit.source: This spell can't be countered.\nDestroy target permanent. Target player draws four cards. Take an extra turn after this one.\nExile CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 此咒语不能被反击。 消灭目标永久物。目标牌手抓四张牌。于本回合后进行额外的一个回合。 放逐CARDNAME。

trans-unit.target: 闪现 你可以将无色咒语视同具有闪现异能地来施放。 每当你施放无色咒语时，直到回合结束，CARDNAME获得践踏异能且得+X/+X，X为该咒语的法术力值。

trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a colorless creature spell, manifest the top card of your library.\nWhenever you attack with creatures with total power 6 or greater, you may turn a face-down creature you control face up.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放无色生物咒语时，显化你的牌库顶牌。 每当你以力量总和等于或大于6的生物攻击时，你可以将一个由你操控且牌面朝下的生物翻回正面。

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with three loyalty counters on it.\n{T}: Add {W}.\nWhenever a planeswalker enters the battlefield under your control, if CARDNAME has loyalty counters on it, you may move a loyalty counter from CARDNAME onto that planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有三个忠诚指示物。 {T}：加{W}。 每当一个鹏洛客在你的操控下进战场时，若CARDNAME上有忠诚指示物，则你可以将CARDNAME上的一个忠诚指示物移至该鹏洛客上。

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose any number of target planeswalkers you control. Until end of turn, they become 3/3 blue Bird creatures with flying, hexproof, and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, scry 1." (They're no longer planeswalkers. Loyalty abilities can still be activated.)
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，选择任意数量目标由你操控的鹏洛客。直到回合结束，它们成为3/3蓝色的鸟生物，且具有飞行、辟邪与「每当此生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，占卜1。」（它们不再是鹏洛客。仍能起动其忠诚异能。）

trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.\nCARDNAME is the chosen type in addition to its other types.\nWhenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, you may draw a card for each other creature you control that shares a creature type with it. If you do, discard a card.
